page.title: 05Living in the Country
page.content: Life is very comfortable for those living in this area.The houses have ample living space,well furnished,with modern appliances eg.television,radio, central heating,cookers,food_mixers, telephones,record_players,stereo and video units. Most families own one car,many have more than one,regarding this as essen_ tial.Food shopping trips by car to New ton Abbot supermarkets,or Moretonhamp_ stead,are kept to a minimum,as many families own deep freezers.Clothes fur niture etc are bought in Exeter. Some families consist of a retired couple who grow their own fruit and vegetables.One family (husband,wife and two children) lives abroad during the winter,and has bought their cott_ age as a retirement home. Cooking is by electricity or 'Aga'.
